name: Golden Retriever (Pepotrouille)
description:
Play in fullscreen if you want to have the perfect gameplay !

*****************************************

Golden Retriever is a Battleship like game where you have to mine to find gold, and help your doggo to buy his dreamed kibbles house !
For that, try to make the best score, developping strategies and memorizing where are the best ledge !

          Controls:
Mouse Left Click: Move to direction
Mouse Right click: Mine in front of the dog
